availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Anderson County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Lacefield. Father of William Crawford Lacefield, Mary Lacefield, and Henry Lacefield. Married to Nancy Lacefield. Father of John LAcefield and Thomas Lacefield. Laborer in Shelby County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Anderson County in 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Shelby County, District 2, p. 346; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Anderson County, p. 61.
